thread.title: 8 unborn babies die near Lucknow, probe ordered for negligence
thread.title_full: 8 unborn babies die near Lucknow, probe ordered for negligence - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 8 unborn babies die near Lucknow, probe ordered for negligence
text:
BULANDSHAHR: Eight women lost their unborn babies allegedly after they were given an overdose of oxytocin to induce labour at a health centre at Danpur town here, prompting authorities to initiate an inquiry.
The matter came to light after a victim, Suman, resident of Tulsigarhi village, lodged a complaint with the chief medical officer that a ward boy at the primary health centre allegedly gave her an overdose of oxytocin to induce labour.
Eight women had lost their unborn babies in the last one week allegedly under similar circumstances.
Chief Medical officer Deepak Ohri said he is taking cognizance of the matter and a concerned additional CMO has been direct to conduct an inquiry into the deaths. http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/followceleb.cms?alias=oxytocin to induce labour,Eight women lost their unborn babies,authorities to initiate an inquiry,allegedly after an overdose of oxytocin Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
